name: Solitaire - Ali Baba
description:
*******************************************************
Love some variety in your game of solitaire?
Why not try Solitaire Sweet?
4 great versions of Solitaire for under $3!
Includes the all time best seller, 40 Thieves.

If you want a more challenging game, try 40 Thieves Lite (https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/forty-thieves-lite/id509257513?ls=1&mt=8).
Compete to get the best scores on the leaderboard.
*******************************************************


Ali Baba is a variation of Forty Thieves.
You can play by dragging or double tapping.
Double finger scroll down to show top toolbar on iPhone, double finger scroll up to hide it.

Rules:
One deck of cards are used (52 cards total).
Ten tableau piles of 4 cards each, face up and visible.
Four foundation piles (top right of display)
Remaining cards (stock) are placed face down (top left of display).
You may move the top card from any tableau (middle right of display) or a group of cards in the proper sequence (same suit, descending values).
For every empty tableau, you may move one or more cards from a tableau to occupy the space.
You may place any card in an empty tableau.
Tableaus are built down by suit (king to ace).
Foundations are built up by suit (ace to king).
You may deal one card from stock to waste at a time.
You may only use the top card from the waste.
You may only go through the stock once.
The object of the game is to move all cards to the foundations (4 piles ace to king of the same suit).
Do you have what it takes to win this game?
